description:
Hello Bristol Gophers 👋!

We're super excited to continue our series of Golang talks.

Speakers:

🗣️ Karim Rashad (Utility Warehouse & Kaluza) - To Be Announced

More details coming soon!

🗣️ Alexander Jophus Trelore - Rapidly Developing Go Servers

Go has become massively popular, there's no denying it. But how can you develop a server using it using all the classics like docker and kubernetes when it can take some time to compile and start!?

Alexander is mostly a dog dad these days. Following that, he's also a serial startup joiner, probably coming to a startup near you providing they do Go.

⏰ Schedule (possibly):

* 18:00-18:15 welcome/pizza/intro
* 18:15-18:45 first speaker
* 18:45-18:50 small break
* 18:50-19:20 second speaker
* 19:15-19:30 farewell/next event info

❤️ Sponsors

* AJ Bell (venue)
* Formula Recruitment (food/drinks)

📍 - Pivot+Mark
title: Golang Talks @ Pivot+Mark
